name: Cyber Angels
author: silentlofd - meme police
notes: The worst season for me, lost 7x promo in total. As for CAffira deck, lost 2x promo with mind scan, couldnt reach promo with restart, lost 1x promo with standard build balance. And finally switched 1 petite with bacon and it did the job. If you're going first with saffira and bacon in hand, choose draw 2 and discard the bacon instead of the usual discard from opponents hand. It saved me from some e-con take attempts.
